title: Whereas the late farmers of His Majesties customs and other revenues of this kingdom, have convenanted with His Majesty, that they shall, and will pay and discharge all debentures for repayments of customs for foreign goods made within the time of their farm ... by the Lord Deputy and Council, Arran.
author: Ireland. Lord Deputy.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke and John Crooke ... and are to be sold by Mary Crook and Andrew Crook ...,
